channel.title: Weird graphical problem
channel.description:
Hi everyone.First,Im french.So excuse me for my bad english.
Anyway,I have a weird problem when i'm equipping my character.I hope someone have a solution :/ I'm using Ardi 317.
The problem occur in three steps.Put the legs,put the platebody and removing the platebody. And i think it is not the client.But something in the source.
474 client : http://gyazo.com/f7d9671d6ada399231480862151f3c31
Same thing if i'm using a 317 client : http://gyazo.com/9e7d03b9423ab553f7bdabff1610441d
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Weird graphical problem
item.dc:creator: @khyngers2 khyngers2
item.description:
@khyngers2 wrote:

Hi everyone.First,Im french.So excuse me for my bad english.

Anyway,I have a weird problem when i’m equipping my character.I hope someone have a solution
